about_the_game: The World of Cat Quest Artbook provides a treasure trove of insights behind the art of the Cat Quest franchise, from initial idea conceptions pre-Cat Quest, all the way through to the paw-geous artistic creations of Cat Quest III!
detailed_description: The World of Cat Quest Artbook provides a treasure trove of insights behind the art of the Cat Quest franchise, from initial idea conceptions pre-Cat Quest, all the way through to the paw-geous artistic creations of Cat Quest III!
legal_notice: Cat Quest III ©2024 The Gentlebros Pte Ltd. "Cat Quest", "Gentlebros" and their related logos are all brands of The Gentlebros Pte Ltd. Developed by The Gentlebros Pte. Ltd, a member of the Kepler Interactive Group. Published by Kepler Interactive. All rights reserved.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: The World of Cat Quest Artbook provides a treasure trove of insights behind the art of the Cat Quest franchise, from initial idea conceptions pre-Cat Quest, all the way through to the paw-geous artistic creations of Cat Quest III!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai
